LanguageSerializer.NewUpdateDialogInfoText: New updates can be downloaded for {0}.
LanguageSerializer.NoUpdateDialogHeader: There are no new updates available.
LanguageSerializer.LocalDataCreationErrorText: The folder for the package data couldn't be created. {0}
LanguageSerializer.FileTooBigErrorCaption: The update file is too big.
LanguageSerializer.FileTooBigErrorText: nUpdate will not allow to install the update in order to save your RAM.
LanguageSerializer.PackageNotFoundErrorText: The update package couldn't be validated because it is missing.
LanguageSerializer.InvalidSignatureErrorText: The package contains an invalid signature and could be dangerous. In order to avoid any security risks, nUpdate will not allow to install the package and delete it unrecoverably.
LanguageSerializer.InvalidSignatureAndFileDeletingFailedErr: The package contains an invalid signature and could be dangerous.{0}In order to avoid any security risks, nUpdate will not allow to install the package.{0}Unfortunately nUpdate could not remove the update package because of an system error. Please delete this package immediately because it could contain viruses and/or malware in order to damage your PC.{0}{1}
